seller_description: This Set of 2 PVC Hex Dumbbells, each weighing 5 kg (total 10 kg), is perfect for resistance training, fitness classes, or at-home workout routines. Proudly made in India, these durable dumbbells are designed with an easy-grip and anti-slip surface for safe and comfortable handling during intense workouts. Their compact design ensures they occupy minimal storage space, making them ideal for home gyms. Suitable for aerobics, step workouts, or standard strength training, these dumbbells add intensity and resistance to help you achieve your fitness goals. Backed by a 6-month warranty for manufacturing defects, they offer reliability and durability for long-term use.
review: Perfect for home gym, its soft plastic but heavy. And really strong and good quality.
